name: is-my-internet-working
description: A simple page polling an active internet connection written in Purescript
author: Jacob Alford

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:build && npm run bundle:dce && npm run bundle:esbuild
scripts.serve-dev: cp ./assets/static-html/index.html ./dist/index.html && concurrently "npm run esbuild -- --bundle index-dev.js --servedir=dist" "npm run build-css-dev"
